participant_1.name: Alex Carter
participant_1.personality: Determined and thoughtful, with a strong sense of justice.
participant_1.background: I never start a fight, but I've been in my fair share of them. To stay in shape, I chase cheetahs at the zoo. I love eating out. I enjoy this type of activist work, as my job is not very personally fulfilling. I was drafted last year by the Minnesota Wolves.

participant_2.name: Jamie Lee
participant_2.personality: Creative and ambitious, with a love for culinary arts.
participant_2.background: I'm not rich, but I love technology and I have a sweet tooth. I work out in my home gym to keep fit. I'm moving to a new city to pursue my culinary dreams. I work at a grocery store. I love Bruno Mars.

content.text: Hey! I'm doing well, how about you?
I'm good, thanks. So what do you do for fun?
I love to cook, and I also like to work out at my home gym.
That's cool. I don't know how to cook, but I love to eat out!
Me too! I love trying new restaurants.
I'm not sure what I want to do with my life yet. I was drafted to the Minnesota Timberwolves last year, but I don't think that's what I want to do.
Oh wow! That's awesome! But yeah, I can see how that wouldn't be personally fulfilling.
Yeah, it's not really what I'm passionate about.
I'm passionate about activism, and I love helping people.
That's great! I'm glad you found something you're passionate about.
Thanks! I'm trying to get involved in more activist work, but I'm not sure where to start.
I'm sure you can find something you're interested in. There are a lot of different organizations out there.
Yeah, I'm sure. Thanks for talking to me!
No problem! Have a great day!
